title: Initialize and First Commit

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Initialize and First Commit

Start tracking this project with git!

## Objectives
1. Initialize a git repository
2. Add all files
3. Create your first commit with message 'Initial commit'

// My first tracked project
console.log('Hello, Git!');
